Articles.Content:
Hi there,

I'm Ki11aWi11 and I've been playing Kerbal Space Program for two months now. I enjoy it a hell of alot and I'm looking forward to all the coming features. I've landed stock craft on the MÃƒÂ¼n, Minmus, and placed space stations into orbit and switched crews by EVA from a distance of 20m etc, I recently downloaded Mech Jeb, and I'm currently practicing landing spacecraft with in 100m with and with out Mech Jeb. The reason I'm doing this is because I'm planning to attempt a Constellation Program style landing on one of the new planets when 0.17 comes put.

I hope to be able to make contributions to the community by maybe sharing some craft designs and tutorials of proven spacecraft.
Welcome to the forums and sounds like you got a good hang on the game.
